pr_title: [NETBEANS-3942] FlatLaf: fix editor annotations when switching LaF and switching color profile too on restart

timeline.message: [NETBEANS-3942] FlatLaf: fix editor annotations when switching LaF and switching color profile too on restart

timeline.bodyText: Wow! That is ugly. Isn't the UI misplaced when it needs to use reflection to load a class from other module? If not, then ideally there would be an SPI interface CurrentProfile and one would use Lookup.getDefault().lookupAll(CurrentProfile.class).forEach(it -> it.setProfile(preferredProfile)).
timeline.author: JaroslavTulach

replies.bodyText: That's true, filed NETBEANS-4039 for this. And yes, we blindly followed the pattern was used before us.
replies.author: lkishalmi
